content.text:
# 13th Filmfare Awards South

The 13th Filmfare Awards South Ceremony honoring the winners of the best of South Indian cinema in 1965 was an event held on 1966.
Awards
{| class="wikitable" width=100% |
|-
! !  style="background:#eedd82; text-align:center; width:50%;"|Best Tamil Film
! !  style="background:#eedd82; text-align:center; width:50%;"|Best Telugu Film
|-
| valign="top" |
*Thiruvilaiyadal - A. P. Nagarajan
| valign="top" |
*Antastulu - V. B. Rajendra Prasad
|-
! !  style="background:#eedd82; text-align:center; width:50%;"|Special Award
|-
| valign="top" |
*M. G. Ramachandran - Enga Veettu Pillai
|-
|}
References
* Filmfare Magazine 1966.
